mulan.classifier.clus

Class ClusWrapperClassification

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
      • mulan.classifier.clus.ClusWrapperClassification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MultiLabelLearner, TechnicalInformationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusWrapperRegression, ClusWrapperRegression

    public class ClusWrapperClassification
extends MultiLabelLearnerBase
    This class implements a wrapper for the multi-label classification methods included in CLUS library.
    Version:
    2013.04.01
    Author:
    Eleftherios Spyromitros-Xioufis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String clusWorkingDir
      The directory where all temporary files needed or generated by CLUS library are written.
      protected String datasetName
      The dataset name that will be used for training, test and settings files.
      protected boolean isEnsemble
      Whether an ensemble method will be used.
      protected boolean isRuleBased
      Whether a rule-based method will be used.
      protected String settingsFilePath
      Path to the settings file.

      • Fields inherited from class mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase

        featureIndices, labelIndices, labelNames, numLabels

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusWrapperClassification

        public ClusWrapperClassification(String clusWorkingDir,
                                 String datasetName)
        Constructor with 2 arguments. This constructor is used when the settings file that is required by CLUS will be created inside the class.
        Parameters:
        clusWorkingDir - the working directory for clus
        datasetName - the name of the dataset

      • ClusWrapperClassification

        public ClusWrapperClassification(String clusWorkingDir,
                                 String datasetName,
                                 String settingsFilePath)
        Constructor with 3 arguments. This constructor is used when an existing settings file will be used.
        Parameters:
        clusWorkingDir - the working directory for clus
        datasetName - the name of the dataset
        settingsFilePath - the path for settings file

    • Method Detail

      • buildInternal

        protected void buildInternal(MultiLabelInstances trainingSet)
                      throws Exception
        This method does the following:
        1. Creates a working directory for the CLUS library
        2. Makes the supplied training set CLUS compliant and copies it to the working directory
        3. Modifies the File, TestSet and Target lines of the settings file to the appropriate values
        Specified by:
        buildInternal in class MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Parameters:
        trainingSet - the training data set
        Throws:
        Exception - if learner model was not created successfully

      • makePredictionInternal

        protected MultiLabelOutput makePredictionInternal(Instance instance)
                                           throws Exception,
                                                  InvalidDataException
        This method exists so that CLUSWrapperClassification can extend MultiLabelLearnerBase. Also helps the Evaluator to determine the type of the MultiLabelOutput and thus prepare the appropriate evaluation measures.
        Specified by:
        makePredictionInternal in class MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to predict on
        Returns:
        the output of the learner for the given instance
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs while making the prediction.
        InvalidDataException - if specified instance data is invalid and can not be processed by the learner

      • makeClusCompliant

        public static void makeClusCompliant(MultiLabelInstances mlDataset,
                                     String fileName)
                              throws Exception
        Takes a dataset as a MultiLabelInstances object and writes an arff file that is compliant with CLUS.
        Parameters:
        mlDataset - the dataset as a MultiLabelInstances object
        fileName - the name of the generated arff file
        Throws:
        Exception - Potential exception thrown. To be handled in an upper level.
